text: Stanley Hepton (3 December 1932 – 15 April 2017) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Blackpool, Huddersfield Town, Bury, Rochdale and Southport during the 1950s and 1960s. ==References== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Footballers from Leeds Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Bury F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Stan Hepton
